title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Hypothetical Learning Trajectories (HLT) for Elementary Geometry Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometric concepts (points, lines, planes, shape classification) and understanding of elementary education curricula
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can structure elementary geometry learning activities by applying the three stages of the HLT design framework: pre-design, instructional experimentation, and retrospective analysis.
Learners can develop an HLT prototype reflecting cultural contexts (ethnomathematics) and establish revision strategies based on learner error patterns.
Learners can implement learning designs combining peer feedback and self-reflection through project-based assessments in online environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
